name: Jax's Diary
description: A diary that bodyguard Jax has given, saying that it will aid in the search for Solt's and Makel's maps

name: 1st Torn Map Piece
description: A piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Solt. Gather 4 of these

name: 2nd Torn Map Piece
description: A piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Makel. Gather 4 of these

name: Solt's Map
description: A map where the name of the former lord's guard Solt is written

name: Makel's Map
description: A map where the name of the former lord's guard Makel is written

name: Combined Map
description: Using the map (alt-m), find the hiding place of the lord's gold bar

name: Rusted Key
description: A rusty copper key discovered while digging under the tree indicated on the map

name: Gold Bar
description: A gold bar stamped with Duke Ashton's seal. Take this to Alex

name: Alex's Recommend
description: A recommendation written by Alex. Take this to Master Luther

name: Mark of Searcher
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Searcher. An occupation change related item

name: Report of Perrin
description: Take this report and go seek Perrin in Gludin Harbor

name: Kristina's Letter
description: A letter given by Saint Kristina. Deliver this to Master Sorius

name: Picture of Windy
description: A picture of Windy. Take this drawing to Windy

name: Golden Statue
description: The reward given by the head of the orphanage. Something good happens if this is in possession?\0

name: Windy's Pebbles
description: A pebble that Windy has picked up from the Wastelands. Take this to Gup the head of the orphanage near Gludio

name: Order of Sorius
description: Take these orders and show them to Daurin, who is located west of the Orc Barracks

name: 1st Secret Letter
description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina

name: 2nd Secret Letter
description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina

name: 3rd Secret Letter
description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina

name: 4th Secret Letter
description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina

name: Mark of Healer
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Healer. An occupation change related item

name: Mark of Reformer
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Reformer. An occupation change related item

name: Book of Reform
description: A book received from Priestess Pupina. Go to the Execution Grounds and slay the nameless undeads with the power of light

name: Letter of Introduction
description: A letter introducing Priestess Pupina. Take this and meet with to Preacher Sla of the Wastelands

name: Sla's Letter
description: A letter given by Sla. Take this to Katari, who is near the waterfalls of the Neutral Zone

name: Greetings
description: A letter sent by Sla to her disciples. Go to the Orc Village, Dwarven Village, and Talking Island in this order

name: Ol Mahum's Money
description: Ol Mahum currency given by the themselves as a reward. For what...? Nobody knows

name: Katari's Letter
description: Katari's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla

name: Nyakuri's Letter
description: Nyakuri's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla

name: Undead List
description: Skeleton archer, skeleton lord, skeleton marksman, misery skeleton, silent horror

name: Ramus's Letter
description: A reply letter sent by Ramus to Sla. Deliver this to Sla after meeting all of Sla's disciples

name: Ripped Diary
description: Diaries containing the final words of young women unfairly killed during the witch hunts of Duke Byron Ashton. Collect 7 of them

name: Huge Nail
description: The large nail that was embedded in Aruraune's skull. Take this to Priestess Pupina at Town of Giran

name: Letter of Betrayer
description: A letter given by an Ol Mahum Betrayer. Take it to Katari in the swamp area of the Dark Forest

name: Bone Fragment
description: Bone pieces of a silent horror. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton lord. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton marksman. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment from a misery skeleton. Take it along with other bone fragments of the undead to Ramus

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton archer. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

name: Mark of Magus
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Magus. An item for occupational change

name: Rukal's Letter
description: A letter sent by Bard Rukal to Parina of the Village of Gludin

name: Parina's Letter
description: A letter sent by Parina to Elder Casian. The letter makes inquiries regarding the singing flower

name: Lilac Charm
description: A protection charm created by Elder Casian. Take this and seek out the 3 types of singing flowers

name: 1st Golden Seed
description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal

name: 2nd Golden Seed
description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal

name: 3rd Golden Seed
description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal

name: Score of Elements
description: A music score sheet given by Bard Rukal. Take this and find the 4 elemental tones

name: Dazzling Drop
description: A dazzling, tear-shaped jewel. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Water Undine

name: Flame Crystal
description: A crystal obtained from the ghost fire. Gather 5 of these and take them to the Flame Salamander

name: Harpy's Feather
description: The feather of a slain harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph

name: Wyrm's Wingbone
description: The wingbone of a slain Wyrm. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph

name: Windsus Mane
description: The mane of a slain Windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph

name: Enchanted Monster Eye Shell
description: The skin of a slain enchanted eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake

name: Enchanted Golem Powder
description: Stone powder obtained after slaying an enchanted stone golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake

name: Enchanted Iron Golem Shard
description: A fragment of a destroyed enchanted iron golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake

name: Tone of Water
description: One that comprises the beautiful harmony of the 4 elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion

name: Tone of Fire
description: One that comprises the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion

name: Tone of Wind
description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion

name: Tone of Earth
description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion

name: Salamander Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Flame Salamander. It promises to give the tone of fire in return for 5 flame crystals

name: Sylph Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Wind Sylph. It promises to give the tone of wind in return for materials gathered from the harpy, Wyrm, and Windsus

name: Undine Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Water Undine. It promises to give the tone of water in return for 20 dazzling drops

name: Serpent Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Earth Snake. It promises to give the tone of earth in return for slaying the enchanted monsters in the surroundings of the Ivory Tower

name: Recommendation of Balanki
description: A recommendation given by Silver Scale's Balanki. Gather all 3 recommendations and visit Lockirin of the Iron Gate

name: Recommendation of Filaur
description: A recommendation given by Filaur of the Gray Pillar. Gather all 3 recommendations and seek out Lockirin of the Iron Gate

name: Recommendation of Arin
description: A recommendation given by Black Anvil's Arin. Gather all 3 recommendations and go to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

name: Mark of Maestro
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Maestro. An occupation change related item

name: Letter of Solder Detachment
description: A letter from Captain Croto that promises to send soldiers. Deliver this to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

name: Paint of Kamuru
description: A painting of Kamuru. Go to the Cave of Trials in the orc kingdom to seek him out

name: Necklace of Kamuru
description: A necklace worn by Kamuru. Deliver this to Captain Croto

name: Paint of Teleport Device
description: A drawing of a teleport device. Recover this device from Master Toma

name: Teleport Device
description: A teleport device given by Master Toma. Deliver this to Black Anvil's Arin

name: Architecture of Cruma
description: A simple explanation of Cruman architecture. Take this to the research team stationed at the entrance of the Cruma Tower

name: Report of Cruma
description: A report recording the results of investigations made by the Cruma research team. Deliver this to Eldar Filaur

name: Ingredients of Antidote
description: Gather 10 stinger wasp needles, 10 marsh spider webs, and 10 leech bloods and deliver them to Researcher Lorain

name: Stinger Wasp Needle
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain

name: Marsh Spider's Web
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain

name: Leech Blood
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain

name: Mark of Warspirit
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the War Spirit. An item for occupational change

name: Vendetta Totem
description: A totem given to the Orcs who seek to punish betrayers of their race. Take this and hunt the Tamlin Orcs

name: Tamlin Orc Head
description: The head of a slain Tamlin Orc. Gather 13 of these and take them to Seer Somak

name: Warspirit Totem
description: A totem used in the Ritual of the War Spirit. Take this to Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials

name: Orim's Contract
description: I will give you Braki's remains in return for 10 porta eyes, 10 excuro scales and 10 mordeo talons

name: Porta's Eye
description: A jewel pried from the porta's eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow

name: Excuro's Scale
description: The scales of an excuro. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow

name: Mordeos Talon
description: The talons of a mordeo. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow

name: Braki's Remains
description: The remains of Braki, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 3 remains, to Seer Somak

name: Pekiron's Totem
description: A guardian totem received from Seer Pekiron. Take this and go to the Leto lizardman shamans and chiefs to recover Tonar's remains

name: Tonar's Skull
description: The skull of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron

name: Tonar's Rib Bone
description: The rib bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron

name: Tonar's Spine
description: The spine bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron

name: Tonar's Arm Bone
description: The arm bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron

name: Tonar's Thigh Bone
description: The thigh bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron

name: Tonar's Remains
description: The remains of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other 3 heroes' remains, to Seer Somak

name: Manakia's Totem
description: A totem received from Seer Manakia. Take this and go to the medusas and Steno the gorgon queen, to recover Hermodt's remains

name: Hermodt's Skull
description: The skull of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia

name: Hermodt's Rib Bone
description: The rib bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia

name: Hermodt's Spine
description: The spine bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia

name: Hermodt's Arm Bone
description: The arm bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia
